ygData.subject: Re: SK's of Pallies?
ygData.msgSnippet: Well it s Pally vs Shadow Knight not Pally vs Necro... If it was... poooooor pally would lose big time! At lvl 50 the Necro pet would kick the Pallies
ygData.messageBody:
Well it's Pally vs Shadow Knight not Pally vs
Necro...<br>If it was... poooooor pally would lose big
time!<br>At lvl 50 the Necro pet would kick the Pallies butt
and suck em up through a straw, while the Necro was
outside smoking a fag... Well sort of... Anyhow... i
don't think many classes can stand up to a Necro.. At
lvl 4 i'm kicking black bear butt with my Necro Next
lvl I'll try some YK butt just for measure.. :)
(Disseasecloud + poisonbolt + ClingingDarkness + Fear + pet =
dead bear.. Meditate and repeat)
